item.description: Bartering, the exchange of skills and services with one another without financial remuneration is a great idea (in theory), especially in this economy. Many of us know what we need but aren’t sure what we have to offer. Right now, our Mothers & More chapter is made up of women who are talented, generous, busy and for the most part, trying to reprioritize limited financial resources. We could create a simple bartering system that works. Come and brainstorm with us! You might never need to rake leaves again!!
item.name: Discussion: Bartering
